pages.text: Tara je kahi phayade tyanna pohocavile jata rahile, tyapaiki kahihi tyanna upayoga padu sakanara nahi
Ani amhi konatyahi vastila nasta kele nahi, parantu asaca sthitita ki ticyasathi khabaradara karanare hote
Bodha (upadesa) cya svarupata ani amhi atyacara karanara nahi
Ani ya (kura'ana) la saitana ghe'una ale nahita
Ani na te yacya yogya aheta, na tyanna yace samarthya ahe
Kimbahuna te tara aikanyapasunahi vancita kele gele aheta
Yastava tumhi allahacya sobata dusarya ekhadya aradhya daivatala pukaru naka an'yatha tumhihi siksa prapta karanaryampaiki vhala
Ani apalya javalacya nateva'ikanna (allahace) bhaya dakhava
Ani tyancyasi naramine vaga, jo koni imanadharaka ho'una tumacya adhina ho'ila
Jara he loka tumaci avajna karatila tara tumhi ailana kara ki tumhi je kahi karita ahata mi tyapasuna alipta ahe
Ani apala purna bharosa tyavara rakha jo varcasvasali, dayavana ahe
Jo tumhala pahata asato, jevha tumhi (namajasathi) ubhe rahata
Ani sajada karanaryammadhye tumace hindane phiranehi
Nihsansaya to (allaha) motha aikanara ani motha jananara ahe
Kaya mi tumhala sangu ki saitana konavara utaratata
Te pratyeka khotya, duracarivara utaratata
Te (varavara) aikaleli gosta pohacavitata ani tyancyapaiki bahuteka khote aheta
Ani kavince anusarana teca loka karatata, je pathabhrasta asaveta
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki kavi dari - darita doke apatata phiratata
Ani te je mhanatata te karata nahita

Tyancyakherija jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarme kelita ani mothya sankhyene allahaci prasansa (namahsmarana) karita rahile ani apana atyacarapidita asalyanantara suda ghetala, ani jyanni atyacara kela ahe te dekhila lavakaraca januna ghetila ki konatya kusivara ulatatata
